request.description:
The api to update the like and dislike count of a post.
**The request requires two information**
- Pass the id of the blog whose like dislike count needs to be updated
-Pass the boolean value of which needs to be updated

**"like":true**

For the like number to be updated

**"dislike":true**

For the dislike to be updated.

The API returns the blog post with the updated like count to reuse in the frontend.

This API takes the id of a blog to delete it.

- The API takes the id of the post that needs to be deleted as a route paramete.
-This is a **protected route**. So header should include "auth-token"
-If the auth-token is verified, a user object will be created with in request.
-The API is designed in such a way that a person can only delet if the post was his.

**Response upon successful deletion**

A message will be sent - "post deleted"

**Response upon ussuccessful deletion**

A message will be sent - "post not found or you are not authorized"

Call this API to edit a particular blog

**The API request requires :**

- Pass the id of a blog in the routing parameter 
- title: The changed title of the blog. Ifnot changed send the original one. **Do not send any null value**. That wouldn't throw error rather. save it.
- content: The changed body of the content.**Do not send any null value**. That wouldn't throw error rather  save it.
- The api takes into accont that only owner can edit his post. So Do remember to send **auth-token** in header
